caption.center: Clarence O. GREEN, Jr., Appellant, v. STATE of Florida, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fifth District.

opinion.posture: 3.800 Appeal from the Circuit Court for Lake County, T. Michael Johnson, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Clarence O. Green, Jr., Raiford, pro se.
Charles J. Crist, Jr., Attorney General, Tallahassee, and Allison Leigh Morris, Assistant Attorney General, Daytona Beach, for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED without prejudice to Appellant to file a legally sufficient motion under Rule 3.800(a). See Rose v. State, 871 So.2d 1044 (Fla. 5th DCA 2004).
PETERSON, PALMER and TORPY, JJ., concur.
